comment.author: 8680508@N06
comment._content: I went to that school from 1972 to 1981. It had students ranging from K-8 grades. K-4 was in the newer building, and the 5-8 graders were in the old building, which was built in 1897. I lived about three miles east of this school. It is too bad that my memory will not click as to who is who in the picture.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
We are thrilled that you are seeing so many great images from your childhood in our holdings!
Jerry (U.S. National Archives)

comment.author: 8680508@N06
comment._content: Thank you for having these pictures! I was thrilled to see them when I searched out Rock School Piceance Creek.
